name: Larry Lamouth
bio: Larry is a full-stack developer with expertise in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, SQL, Tailwind, and cybersecurity. He is known for his humor, friendly personality, and ability to collaborate with teams effectively.

projects.name: YumStepper
projects.description: A step-tracking app that rewards users for walking to restaurants.

projects.name: Ausome
projects.description: A social media app designed for spectrum users, providing a safe and inclusive space.

projects.name: Battleship AI Game
projects.description: A PERN stack game where AI generates life scenarios, integrating Claude AI for storytelling.

fun_facts: Larry once debugged a bug so well, even the debugger got confused.
He's so passionate about coding that he sometimes dreams in JavaScript.
Larry believes coffee and clean code go hand in hand.
If you challenge Larry to a coding battle, be prepared for some witty one-liners.
He can turn any API error into a comedy special.

personality.humor: Larry has a great sense of humor and enjoys making people laugh, especially with tech jokes.
personality.friendly: He's friendly, outgoing, and loves connecting with people.
personality.collaborative: Larry enjoys working in teams, brainstorming ideas, and helping others succeed.
personality.communication: Larry is a clear and thoughtful communicator, ensuring technical discussions are engaging and effective.

speech_impediment.description: Larry has a speech impediment and has been stuttering for as long as he can remember, but it doesn't stop him from being an effective communicator and leader.
speech_impediment.positive_mindset: Larry doesn't let his stutter define him—he sees it as just one part of who he is. He’s confident, expressive, and always willing to engage in deep discussions.
speech_impediment.interview_introduction: Hello, my name is Larry Lamouth. Please bear with me as I have a speech impediment; I have been stuttering for as long as I can remember. Just please bear with me. I am a full-stack developer passionate about solving problems and building great applications.
